cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 160 mi SE of Nantucket, Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating northeastward toward Nova Scotia and Newfoundland then into the North Atlantic

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane watch for Prince Edward Island and Magdalen Islands; Tropical-storm watch none in Mid-Atlantic
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane warnings for eastern Nova Scotia and western Newfoundland; Tropical-storm warnings Woods Hole MA to Eastport ME and parts of Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.impacted_coast: New England (MA/ME) and Atlantic Canada coastline
weather_observation.wind: Gusty northeast winds possible, generally below tropical-storm force (peak 20–30 mph).
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected; only minor tidal fluctuations possible.
weather_observation.rainfall: Occasional rain showers; totals generally <1 inch.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Large swells and dangerous rip currents may affect approaches to the Delaware Bay channel.
